doc.name: wsfield
doc.parameters:
type = e.g. text, textarea, checkbox, hidden, submit ...

name = parameter name

value = value entered or predefined. Alternative option: add_random

class = css class, e.g. form-control, ws-wysiwyg

placeholder =

maxlength = max number of characters

rows = 

checked = for checkboxes

input-email = see docs

input-text = see docs

required = empty (default), required
